hero.title: Leaders in Seeds & Grains: From Our Fields to the World
hero.subtitle: We specialize in the production, processing, and commercialization of high-quality chia and sesame, while empowering small-scale producers.

about.title: About Us
about.content: We are a leading company in the production and commercialization of agricultural and agro-industrial products, with a clear focus on quality, innovation, and sustainability. Our philosophy is based on creating shared value, from our fields to our clients worldwide.

mission.title: Mission
mission.text: To satisfy the needs of our consumers and improve the standard of living of our customers by offering quality products, through the production, transformation, and export of agricultural and agro-industrial products. At the same time, we contribute to the development of our collaborators, suppliers, distributors, and the country.
mission.description: To satisfy the needs of our consumers and improve the standard of living of our customers by offering quality products, through the production, transformation, and export of agricultural and agro-industrial products. At the same time, we contribute to the development of our collaborators, suppliers, distributors, and the country.

vision.title: Vision
vision.text: To be a leading producer and marketer in the national and international market, characterized by compliance with quality standards, constant innovation of our processes, and protection of the environment, while maintaining a high vocation of service, honesty, teamwork, and responsibility.
vision.description: To be a leading producer and marketer in the national and international market, characterized by compliance with quality standards, constant innovation of our processes, and protection of the environment, while maintaining a high vocation of service, honesty, teamwork, and responsibility.

items.name: Honesty
items.description: We act with transparency, achieving greater trust with our clients, collaborators, and the community.

items.name: Commitment
items.description: We are committed to the environment and our surroundings for the generation of work and sustainability, working daily for continuous improvement.

items.name: Generosity
items.description: We provide our wealth in the best way, using the company's resources in a rational manner.

items.name: Innovation
items.description: We are known for working in a different, unique, and incomparable way, daring to do things that no one has done before.

products.title: Our Products
products.intro: We offer a specialized selection of the highest quality grains and seeds, cultivated with care and processed under the strictest standards for the global market.

products_list.name: Chia
products_list.description: Regarded as a superfood, our chia is an exceptional source of fiber, antioxidants, and Omega-3 fatty acids. Perfect for a healthy and balanced diet.

products_list.name: Sesame
products_list.description: Sesame seeds selected for their purity, flavor, and high nutritional value. Ideal for the food industry, baking, and premium quality oils.

products.availability_note: All our products are available in organic and/or conventional versions to meet the specific needs of your market.

process.title: Process & Operations
process.intro: Our strategic presence throughout the territory allows us to efficiently manage the entire value chain, from cultivation in our production centers to final processing in our specialized facilities.

collection_center.name: Collection Center
collection_center.location: Our collection center is located in San Pedro, at Km 175 of the Elizardo Aquino Route.

processing_center.name: Processing Plant
processing_center.location: Processing is carried out at the Shirosawa Company S.A.I.C. facilities, located at Km 172 of the Elizardo Aquino Route in San Pedro.

quality.title: Quality & Certifications
quality.description: Committed to the highest quality standards and international certifications.
quality.intro: Our commitment to excellence is absolute. We comply with the highest international standards for quality and food safety at every stage of our process.

quality_points.name: European Laboratory Analysis
quality_points.description: All our multi-residual, pesticide, and herbicide analyses are performed in a laboratory in Europe to ensure maximum rigor.

quality_points.name: Ozone Treatment
quality_points.description: All of our products are ozonated, a process that ensures their purity and quality without added chemicals.

quality_points.name: Strategic Certification
quality_points.description: We work directly with the CITEC Certifier for sampling and the certification of our loads and products.

quality_points.name: Certified Plants
quality_points.description: The plants where our processes are carried out are ORGANIC, HACCP, and ISO certified.

quality_points.name: International Organic Certifications
quality_points.description: We are currently in the process of obtaining organic certifications for the European and United States markets.

testing.title: Quality Analysis
testing.description: We perform pesticide and herbicide analysis in certified European laboratories.
testing.ozone: Use of ozone in all our products to guarantee maximum quality.

partner.title: Certification Partner
partner.name: CITEC
partner.description: We collaborate with CITEC to maintain our certification standards.

commitment.title: Commitment to Excellence
commitment.description: Our commitment to quality is unwavering. Every product we deliver meets the highest international standards, ensuring the satisfaction and trust of our customers worldwide.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Get in touch with us for more information about our products and services.
contact.intro: We are here to answer your questions. Contact us to learn more about our products and business opportunities.

help_card.title: We are here for you
help_card.description: Do you have questions about our products or services? Don't hesitate to contact us. Our team will be happy to help you.

footer.title: Leaders in Quality Grains and Seeds
footer.subtitle: From field to world, cultivating excellence and sustainability in every grain we produce.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to the most common questions about our products, services, and processes.

questions.question: What does ATLAS Agro Iindustrial S.A. do?
questions.answer: We are dedicated to the production, processing, and commercialization of high-quality seeds and grains. We also offer advice and development for small producers.

questions.question: What products do you offer?
questions.answer: Our main products are Chia and Sesame. Both are available in organic and conventional varieties to suit our customers' needs.

questions.question: How do you ensure the quality of your products?
questions.answer: Quality is fundamental to us. We comply with high quality standards and our processes are carried out in certified plants. We conduct laboratory analyses to ensure that every product batch meets the most demanding specifications before shipment.

questions.question: Do you ship internationally?
questions.answer: Yes. As leaders in the national and international market, we are equipped to export our products to various countries. For specific details on logistics and destinations, please contact our sales team.

questions.question: How can I place an order or request a quote?
questions.answer: To request a quote or initiate an order, please email our sales department at sales@atlasagroindustrial.com. Please include the product of interest, the desired quantity (in metric tons), and the destination port to expedite the process.

questions.question: What are the packaging options?
questions.answer: Our standard packaging consists of 25 kg polypropylene bags, designed to preserve the product's quality. However, we are flexible and can evaluate other packaging options to meet our clients' specific needs.

questions.question: I am a small producer. How can I learn more about your development programs?
questions.answer: We are committed to the growth of our partners. If you are a small producer interested in our advice and development program, please contact us at producers@atlasagroindustrial.com to receive more information.

cta.title: Didn't find your answer?
cta.description: If you have any specific questions that are not on our list, please don't hesitate to contact us. Our team will be happy to help you.
